metadata.title: CVE-2018-14347 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Libextractor before 1.7 contains an infinite loop vulnerability inEXTRACTOR_mpeg_extract_method (mpeg_extractor.c).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.7-1
libextractor3 - 1:1.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libextractor package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.7-1').
